snippet.title: Blades And Rings Gameplay First Look - MMOs.com
snippet.description:
Android: https://goo.gl/5oXeWU 
iOs: https://goo.gl/xLKXwr 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BNR.37Games/ 

https://mmos.com/ (page coming soon) for Blades and Rings reviews, videos, screenshots, music and more! 

Browse through hundreds of free to play MMOs and MMORPGs at https://mmos.com

Blades and Rings  Gameplay First look MMORPG gameplay video + commentary by Omer from MMOs.com

Blades and Rings is a free to play mobile MMORPG available on Android and iOS with a persistent world. It plays a lot like many browser based Chinese games and has automated combat. In fact, the automated combat even works while offline, making the game feel a bit like a clicker game (think Clicker Heroes/Cookie Clicker/etc).

https://twitter.com/MMOsdotcom
https://www.twitch.tv/mmosdotcom
https://www.facebook.com/mmosofficial
